website_summaries.verdict: Neutrogena is known for many quality skin care products, and this retinol cream is another member of the brand's family that's known to deliver results for many users.
pros: A hypoallergenic cream that's formulated with vitamins
Doesn't contain added fragrance, oil, or alcohol
Absorbs quickly – perfect for use at night, but not too heavy to daytime use
cons: Tube only contains 1.4 oz., but a little goes a long way for most users

customer_reviews.title: Almost no Retinol
customer_reviews.text: As a previous review stated, the image showing the ingredients is not the item received. As you can see from the picture the item I received has Retinol listed last. Very disappointed and returning.
customer_reviews.author: Ljones

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth using
customer_reviews.text: This product absorbs well. I use it at bedtime. I have a smooth face. It is maintaining my skin at this point. I would suggest buying a silk pillow case for the pillow that touches your face and hair. They are sold on Amazon. I get many compliments from women about my skin being pretty. I’m a 62 year old Caucasian woman and all compliments are rare at this age. Our culture doesn’t value the beauty of aging. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: awesome sause

customer_reviews.title: Different formula.....Much less Retinol!
customer_reviews.text: There is a new formula of this, where retinol is the last ingredient, instead of somewhere in the middle of the ingredient list as it was in my last purchase. In the future I will be purchasing the Cerave Skin Renewing Skin Serum instead of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Suze

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It has real retinol and is packaged correctly so that it will work. My skin turns slightly red for a minute directly after applying, but I don't have any dryness or flaking or burning. I just have nicer skin when I wake up. My skin looks so much brighter, clearer, and smooth. I'll update after using it for a while longer to let you know about any wrinkle improvement or skin tightening. Update: My skin just looks better and better every time I wake up. It's sooooo soft, smooth, and bright. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Aprily

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Eyes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this at night around my eyes and on my neck. If I use this anti wrinkle cream on my cheeks or chin area I will break out. It does seem to make the skin around my eyes nice and smooth. Neutrogena has good products and this is no exception. I just happen to have sensitive skin but it works for my eyes so I will continue to buy this anti wrinkle cream. If this review has helped you at all please let me know. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: phillygrl

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: falsely advertised. I ordered this because I saw the ingredient list with retinol listed as about the 9th ingredient. The box I received has retinol dead last. Neutrogena has changed the formula and the retinol in this no longer works.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie C.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My problem has always been oily skin... Now that I’m in my late 30s that’s not as much of a problem but it still causes breakouts. I use proactive to clean my face and I use clean and clear zit cream after washing. Then I put this stuff on and my skin always looks amazing. Fresh and wrinkle free. I’ve never used wrinkle cream until just recently and it’s made a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Estrada

customer_reviews.title: very moisturizing and beautifies skin!
customer_reviews.text: this is a must have cream if you are looking for a cream that beautifies the skin. I am in my earlier 40's and have 1 or 2 fine lines on my forehead and this cream eliminates those lines the same night i begun to use it, use it at night and in the morning i am greeted with beautiful smooth skin.i use it with my homemade vitamin c and kojic acid serum.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannot & Karen Jeanbaptise

customer_reviews.title: I can rely on Neutrogena!!!
customer_reviews.text: I Always come back to this one! I see great results and feel no harshness or irritation on my srnsetive skin. I've tried many others, but they just didn't do what i needed for nicer, softer healthier skin. Thank you Neutrogena!!! Please keep the price so nice and fair too! (i'm so tired of trying the expensive scams! ...and tossing hard earned $$ out the window!)
customer_reviews.author: shelley

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkle reduction within a week!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product because I have never used face creams or lotions ever before. I am a 25 year old man and decided it was time to start taking care of my skin better. This cream tightened my skin and reduced wrinkles significantly within the first 3 nights and considerable notices 1 and 2 months after nightly use. I have very sensitive skin and tend to break out, but with regular washing and application, no problems have occurred. I also bought the matching day time SPF 15 anti-wrinkle lotion and suggested eye cream. All 3 combined have improved my skin quality and complexion. I recommend these to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Solom

customer_reviews.title: Reduced neck wrinkles quickly!!
customer_reviews.text: This cream works!! I bought this cream because for years, I have been using sunscreen on my face and not on my neck. I live in Florida, so I’ve developed droopy and wrinkled skin on my neck. For reference, I am 36 years old. Within a week of using this cream on my neck every night, the appearance of my neck has greatly improved! I’ve been FaceTiming a lot with family during the quarantine, and they’ve noticed as well that my neck looks way better and less wrinkly. I’m surprised at how quickly I’ve seen an effect! It’s rare that I even bother to write reviews unless something is really good or really bad, but this cream is REALLY GOOD!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree J. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good for Old and not so Old
customer_reviews.text: I don't have wrinkles, but I'm in my late fifties and skin is getting saggy. So, I tried this product. after a couple of days, I received complements on my skin (without makeup).. Using this product regularly relives the need to use other facial scrubs. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t receive what was pictured
customer_reviews.text: The ingredient list of the item I received does not match what is pictured. Retinol is the last ingredient. Cannot return this item!
customer_reviews.author: CCW

customer_reviews.title: Great, affordable, quality face cream
customer_reviews.text: Great, affordable, quality face cream. I usually buy Olay products, but decided to give this one a try. I love the packaging. I am used to the type that comes in a jar, this one comes in a tube. It definitely hydrates my face and makes my skin appear smooth, hydrated and overall more healthy. It is very lightweight and does not leave your face feeling greasy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Actually gives me a more youthful look
customer_reviews.text: I'm a thrifty shopper when it comes to beauty products yet throughout my life Neutrogena, although more expensive, has never done me wrong. Often the anti-wrinkle creams I've bought show minimal results. After using this product for a week or so, I noticed I looked better, skin looked plumper, fuller. I liked the results. I have dry, sensitive skin. After I wash and dry my face at night, I put this product on. It feels like my skin just drinks it up! I'm now a repeat customer!
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: I'll stick with the Neutro. retinol - twice a week at night... good value
customer_reviews.text: It's strong stuff, so I can't use it every night or my face breaks out... however, based on everything that I've read, adding some retinol to your regimen is recommended for long-term wrinkle management, so that's what I do a couple nights per week. On non-retinol nights (most nights), I use an Olay Regenerist Serum for sensitive skin, but I do believe that having some retinol twice or thrice per week at night is a good idea so I'll keep doing it... and this Neutrogena seems to be a well-reviewed product at a decent price so I'll stick with it.
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: Neutrogena Healthy Skin Anti-Wrinkle Retinol Night Cream with Vitamin E and Vitamin B5 - Night Moisturizer does a pretty good job of making skin look more even. I have not experienced major changes when it comes to wrinkles or pores. Still, I believe it is a good product, it has a number of proven ingredients and did not make my skin itch, caused itching or flaking. It has no scent so it truly is fragrance-free.
customer_reviews.author: askmv

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: If your skin is sensitive, please order a new test tube immediately after opening the test tube. I can't find it anywhere. I think it was sent from London. This version of cream is very delicate and the particles are finer, so it is less abrasive. I use it 2-3 times a week. It is definitely a product I will never lack, so fortunately I was able to find it on Amazon. Also suitable for use on the neck and chest. It even smells good. After using it, my skin felt exceptionally clean and never reddened or inflamed. highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Williams

customer_reviews.title: Helps with flaking
customer_reviews.text: Neutrogena Healthy Skin is my go-to daily moisturizer. I got the night cream version because my skin has been really flaky lately - like significant peeling as though I had a sunburn (but I don't). Anyways, it was suggested to me that it was struggling to turn over fast enough. I decided to give this a try and it has helped a lot! It also smooths out bumps and rough spots. Overall, my skin looks brighter, clearer, and smoother.
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: Somethings definitely not right...Just order direct from brand.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for years, so I know exactly how the texture and scent should be. This last item delivery is suspect. It’s obviously very expired or has been frozen/heated in transit or is inauthentic. The cream comes out thick and chunky (gross), then feels watery when you put it on your skin, and the scent is off. It’s way too much of a hassle to return something this small, but in the future I’ll be ordering direct from Neutrogena’s website. This isn’t the first time I’ve received some shady version of a product from other brands I’m familiar with.
customer_reviews.author: C K

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t buy this because my skin was dry, I bought it because I wanted to get rid of small wrinkles/lines. I’m not prone to acne or dry skin on my face. Been using it for about 2 weeks and it’s made my face very dry and blotchy, and I’ve gotten several pimples. Stopped using it and started using a different facial moisturizer in order to fix the problem it caused. Wondering if I received the real product or a knockoff since I usually rely on Neutrogena’s quality control and trust their products.
customer_reviews.author: A. Van Meerbeke

customer_reviews.title: Didn't see functions
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how to describe my experience, but personally, I didn't see anything improved or worse on my face (after using about 3 months). I also didn't feel any itches to pain, when I heard somebody will.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great product at an incredible price
customer_reviews.text: You cannot beat the value. I started using this because it has a good rating from beautypedia. I've used SO MANY different retinols and this one is excellent. Brown spots have disappeared from around my eyes. My skin loves this stuff and I love the price.
customer_reviews.author: andrea kleist

customer_reviews.title: Super Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about a week or two now. Pros: -Super Moisturizing -applies easy and absorbs fast -Foil tube feels high quality Cons: -small -wish it has a smaller nozzle, too much comes out Overall great product, recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: It worked for my undereye finelines
customer_reviews.text: I have started 8 weeks ago with this serum applying every evening. I am 34, and the finelines under my eyes have literally disappeared. I swear on this product, retinol is the way to go. on top of that the skin fells very smooth with a nice glow. Top recommendation! but don't expose yourself to the sun and wear high spf.
customer_reviews.author: Kasia

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Neutrogena for decades. It has kept my face clear of wrinkles and helped me not to get burned in summer. Many people, including my doctors and nurses are surprised that my age is much older than I appear. It has kept me looking much younger and I recommend it. The prices are good.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: bye bye ewrikles
customer_reviews.text: I have used Neutrogena for years at night, and really helps eliminates fine lines. Sad to say I was a smoker and it does help to decrease the wrinkles above my lips. What is left over after I apply to face, I use on hands. Softens them, too. at 73 yrs I need all the help I can get
customer_reviews.author: BJ Ahern

customer_reviews.title: Prescription substitute
customer_reviews.text: My insurance would not cover the allergist's prescription for my face. When I told him he said use this cream every morning and night and it would be the same as the prescription. I am still using it along with cetaphil soap. Works great. Allergist happy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Beachy Keen

customer_reviews.title: Marginal retinol. Basic moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Yes it’s true. They reformulate it. Retinol went from middle to dead last on the list. The picture is incorrect. I use a 0.15% retinol cream and could feel the effect by using one every other day. This on the other hand feel like water. Save your money and move on unless you’re looking for a basic moisturizer then this might fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Hau.T

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying forever
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! It goes on non-greasy and leaves my skin feeling like velvet afterwards. Moisturizes great without being heavy. I have combo skin that can be sensitive and this has been great. No strong scent, no scent at all really. This is my new favorite product!
customer_reviews.author: elle s crocker

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Keep looking.
customer_reviews.text: I like how moisturizing this product is and the fact that it doesn’t make me breakout. As far as diminishing the signs of wrinkles and fine lines, it doesn’t do that.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Best cream ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff ever! Even my husband has noticed a difference in the fine lines in my face. This isnt a overnight miracle you need to consistently use it ever day for at least 2 months before seeing a difference but wow! Is it worth the wait!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Archibald

customer_reviews.title: Did not see results

Did not notice any change is tone, moisture of softness after using a tube. Not sure if I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: The product was amazing! but don’t buy this from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing not really oily, and it’s like smoothing your skin But product wasn’t protected good enough in the package so it was oxidized You can get it from their official website for like around the same price
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: I'm loving this product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few weeks ago for my dry skin. It has a lovely smell, is nice and thick, and one small amount per the instructions can be used on the entire face and neck area. I can already tell a difference in my skin being more moisturized!
customer_reviews.author: Erin M. Icenhour

customer_reviews.title: So light weight and leaves skin feeling soft and pampered!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product by sheer luck and the amount of positive reviews...and the reviews did NOT lie! I tried this for the first time last night! No I haven’t seen an improvement on my wrinkles but I sure love how it is not scented and so light weight on my skin! Absolutely perfect to wear right before bed! Not at all oily! I can’t wait to see the results!
customer_reviews.author: Mary K.

customer_reviews.title: Super sensitive skin, win.
customer_reviews.text: My skin is so sensitive! This is honestly the ONLY face cream I can use that doesn't cause breakouts, worsening of my eczema or make my rosacea worse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In the eyes of the beholder...beauty
customer_reviews.text: I like the easy application and non greasy, fragrance free part of this night time regiment. I cannot say that I see any significant change in the firmness of my skin or reduced wrinkles as of yet, but in the last three weeks I have received compliments from outsiders who didn't believe that the child accompanying me was my grandson. I'll give it some more time to see for myself, but it's a great moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: nafrotiti

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: At my age I didn't think any wrinkle reducer would really work but this has definitely made a big improvement for my face. Wrinkles haven't totally disappeared--didn't think they would--but they have significantly reduced. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: 1 Crazy Mom Mom

customer_reviews.title: Bought on a whim, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Great for just before bed, I feel and see a difference in the morning compared to when I just use make up removing pad or face wash.
customer_reviews.author: bell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Once again, it's the only place I can get this product at a reasonable price. It's great for sensitive skin, like mine. Shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: K. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: This is a good retinol cream
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time using retinol, I have stopped using it several times. But this retinol cream works for me, so far, no irritation, it spreads well, use only a pea size, inexpensive. This is a good retinol cream, I have sensitive skin, so the way I use it, I wash my face, wait 15 minutes, apply the Neutrogena retinol cream, wait about 5 minutes, and put my moisturizer over it. So far, it's working. Use about 3 times a wk.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Dryed out my face
customer_reviews.text: Dryed our my face and made it scaly and flaky.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: great value daily moisture cream
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of this, because the size is small. Finished one tube and did not seem much different on the skin, on second one now. The price is not so expensive, so use as daily moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Kwan F Ng

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Yet Effective
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for basically a cheap but good nighttime moisturizer. In reading a review of this product on Beautypedia at PaulasChoice.com I decided to give this a try. I'm glad I did. It has a good amount of retinol, yet is not too high a concentration where it causes redness or dryness. It absorbs well--although takes a little time to do so. I have to agree with the review of the product on Beautypedia--for a "drug store" priced moisturizer, it's pretty darn good!
customer_reviews.author: NMGal

customer_reviews.title: Pimples and red eyes
customer_reviews.text: After just the first night, my face broke out in pimples. I'd tried using this a couple of years ago but couldn't because the fumes made my eyes burn after just a couple of nights...this time, it took only that first night to redden my eyes and make them burn. Needless to say, this is one product I won't be testing out again.
customer_reviews.author: doglover

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this night cream. It helps keep my skin moisturized, and I swear it makes my pores smaller and helps with blakcheads and little almost whitehead zits. I am 26, fair skinned, wear little make up, and am allergic to a lot skin products. This is gentle enough to not cause any reactions and does more than I expected for a night cream.
customer_reviews.author: Reagan George

customer_reviews.title: Some what disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: For a cream, it is very light and easy to aply. Sadly, the product information does not tell the consumer the percentage of Retinol in the product. I doubt if I will order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Nanc

customer_reviews.title: Neutrogena is my go to brand.
customer_reviews.text: I use the day cream, and night cream and the pump lotion. Good products, not too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: BARBI PA.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sensitive Skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive, dry skin and rosacea. This is one of the few moisturizers that I can use. It provides just the right amount of moisture without aggravating the rosacea. Please do note that it does not contain a sunscreen, and cannot be used in combination with one.
customer_reviews.author: Rebab

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use and doesn't seem to cause irritation. My face does seem a lot softer after using.
customer_reviews.author: talijane

customer_reviews.title: Great night cream
customer_reviews.text: Great night cream. My skin looks amazing. It hasn’t caused any irritation or acne either. I have sensitive skin and am careful about what I use and Neutrogena products have always been good for me.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Works great on sensitive skin and not greasy.
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually very skin sensitive to products. No problem with this one! A little goes a long way and it doesn't leave my skin greasy. That little tube will definitely be used up!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: As described, & great value
customer_reviews.text: Goes on easily, it started showing results in about a week, love it
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Turpin

customer_reviews.title: I bought this product reading rave reviews but it has ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product reading rave reviews but it has left me with flaky, red and burnt skin. I used it a couple of weeks when i bought and thought my skin is adjusting to the product. I didnt use it for a month and now started using it every other day but still the same result. I want my money back!
customer_reviews.author: HARMEET BHUTANI

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Been using Neutrogena for years with no problems, and I have such sensitive skin. I've heard people that use RetIn A have a harder time with this or any other product. They should state that's what happened-otherwise there's no way this is going to hurt your skin!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn E.

customer_reviews.title: Really works does what it say
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife . She uses it every night before bed . She says it really makes a difference . Would definitely purchase again .
customer_reviews.author: Drew Richards

customer_reviews.title: Must have for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: You know what I love about this? I have dry, but sensitive skin. Most make my skin oily then I break out. No grown woman wants to have breakouts or dry cracked skin with makeup on. Worse 2 things. This product has never made me break out or left my oily layer. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Nicole

customer_reviews.title: This product absorbs well
customer_reviews.text: This product absorbs well. I use it at bedtime. I have a smooth face. It is maintaining my skin at this point. customer_reviews.author: Paul Cockrell

customer_reviews.title: No Breakouts
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I look any younger using this product, but I know it keeps my face softer and protects it from the sun. I use it every morning and night. The biggest plus is that it does not cause breakouts like other face creams.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: My go to night cream
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been this lotion for years and absolutely love it. Defiantly feel moisturized and rejuvenated when I wake up in the morning. Pair this with Neutrogena for men day lotion and you’ve got total protection and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Z. R.

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Expect to see the result!
customer_reviews.text: The package is simple and perfect. This is my first time trying out retinol cream and it doesn’t irritate my skin at all. For the reference I have oily skin. So I have been using it every night for about a week now.
customer_reviews.author: MandarinWoods

customer_reviews.title: Just the right amount of moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for years. Doesn’t make your face greasy. Just the right amount of moisturizer. Cheaper than CVS.
customer_reviews.author: miss book

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this retinol for over 3 months now and have noticed a slight change in fine lines. I use at night and is a great moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie Ciccone

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizer!! Lightweight, easy to apply and not greasy. Def. a keeper! Will buy it again.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for anyone.
customer_reviews.text: I like the way my skin looks after using this product, notice dark spots disappeared. I am 72 years young but this helps retain a youthful glow.

customer_reviews.title: great

customer_reviews.author: ngray

customer_reviews.title: I love it!

customer_reviews.title: and my once oily oily skin is now matte just the way i like it.
customer_reviews.text: This works I use it in the morning and at night around my eyes and all over my face, and my once oily oily skin is now matte just the way i like it.

customer_reviews.text: This product works great in first week of applying it but after that it doesn’t make a lot difference but it really vanished dark spots from acne from my face.

customer_reviews.text: I like using this after an evening shower when my pores are open, it is refreshing and feels great. Good product

I didn't really get it for the Anti-Wrinkle properties, it's a good thing I didn't, it doesn't do a thing for wrinkles. I didn't break out like some have said they did. customer_reviews.title: Used regularly and have seen a difference!

customer_reviews.author: Macie48

customer_reviews.title: Excellent retinol lotion, great value.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent retinol product. I've been using this for over a year now and it keeps my mild acne under control. customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I can't find this is ANY stores. Neutrogena makes something similar in a pump, but I hear that it's pretty harsh on the skin. I got this due to rave reviews -- and Thank You Amazon for carrying it --- and I absolutely love it. I wear it almost nightly under my moisturizer. My skin is smoother and appears fresher in the morning. It did make my nose peel a little bit, but that's when I take a night off. I really like this and hopefully can continue to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna B

customer_reviews.title: Not for eye lines
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for sth for the eye lines but this one looks more like sth for the whole face
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT ANTI-WRINKLE CREAM FOR SENSITIVE SKIN
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE VERY SENSITIVE SKIN, AND GETTING WRINKLED AND DRY. I AM GOING TO BE 55 YEARS OLD. I STARTED TRYING THIS LOTION AFTER A WELL-KNOWN DERMOLOGIST RECOMMENDED IT ON ONE OF THESE TALKS SHOWS, SO I THOUGHT I WOULD GIVE IT A TRY. SHE ALSO MENTIONED, YOU DON'T HAVE TO PAY ALOT OF MONEY FOR A GOOD PRODUCT FOR ANTI-AGING. I USE IT EVERY NIGHT, ALONG WITH THEIR EYE-CREAM. I AM VERY SATICFIED. I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT TO ANYONE.
customer_reviews.author: Arash

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for years!!! It’s a great moisturizer!! I wear it under my make-up,

customer_reviews.title: very irritating for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this product. My skin became very irritated. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Camilla Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Fills light on a skin
customer_reviews.text: In the morning skin felt good, I have red skin and it seems like it was helping with that a bit/
customer_reviews.author: Lera Serova

customer_reviews.title: Haven't noticed a big difference, but is fine as a moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This product is thin and doesn't irritate my skin (very sensitive). Haven't noticed any issues with it, but I also haven't seen a big difference in fine lines. Granted, I'm in my early twenties, but I already have some very fine lines that bother me. I got this mostly as a preventative measure, but am not sure it's any better than a regular moisturizer. Have been using for a bit over a month.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Myers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use lotion/no pimples or eczema flares!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Intact packages-surprised there were two tubes :) Seal intact & unbroken. White light lotion. Rubs in easily. Best part-did not break out in pimples or worsen my eczema or cause dry/flaky skin! Just the 1st week, and Skin seems more even.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain hunter

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by a dermatologist I met in a bar
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by a dermatologist I met in a bar. Skin feels plump and moist in the morning without an excessive greasy feel. Really is a game changer, especially since so many creams now are $50+. Dermatologist told me this at night plus sunscreen during the day will stop sun damage and aging in its tracks.
customer_reviews.author: Pandadachs

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, light, and effective
customer_reviews.text: I'm 25 and don't really have noticeable wrinkles yet so I can't attest to it's ability to reduce already-present wrinkles (hence the 4 stars instead of 5), but I LOVE the way it works on my skin. I've had issues in the past with very dry skin on my face and this took care of that almost immediately. Best of all, the ingredients are noncomedogenic! I am extremely acne prone and this product does not irritate my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective Without the Grease
customer_reviews.text: This is the cream that performs as promised. It does deliver some noticeable impact in making the skin look younger and does make the skin feel smoother. It goes on easy and quickly works its way into the skin without the greasy residue. You can apply and go out without the shiny look. It also does not get that sheen on the face when you sweat. The more expensive creams can definitely take a lesson from Neutrogena with this product. It is on my standard list of repurchases from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Crunchworm

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't clear or lighten any of my blemishes. I won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Janice H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, lightweight cream
customer_reviews.text: I e been using this product for about two months now. Overall, it's a nice face cream. I'm not sure that I've noticed any dramatic change or improvement to my skin, but I do like the texture and weight of this cream. It soaks in quick & is very lightweight for a night cream. A little goes a long way, which is great! The price is reasonable for the amount of product. I recommend & will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley R.

customer_reviews.title: Stings your eyes
customer_reviews.text: Do not use close to eye area, and wash your hands after applying in case you touch your eyes. It will sting. For this reason I won't be buying again. I do like that it does not smell.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: No more foundation
customer_reviews.text: I have always had red skin all through my t zone, I've always worn foundation to cover it. Little did I guess when I bought, the redness would go away as well as having soft smooth skin, I forgot how smooth. I'm 48, who would guess that an anti wrinkle cream world get rid of redness so well I don't wear foundation and my skin looks amazing, better than at 30.
customer_reviews.author: NJSusan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have used it before and now buying it again, it works not only for anti-wrinkle, but also for your acne.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Z

customer_reviews.title: Works great and doesn’t cause blemishes.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Neutrogena is one of my go products. I have nothing negative to say.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Collett

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, sheer no problem moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I like this cream, it doesn't burn, (retinol) spreads great , goes far just takes a couple of dots. A very light fragrance fades quickly. 7 No film , like wearing nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby J Norris

customer_reviews.title: Part of my nightly routine
customer_reviews.text: As a retinol cream, it is okay. My skin is a little dry and I have to supplement this cream with another moisturizing cream.
customer_reviews.author: M. McGhee

customer_reviews.title: They changed the formula now it’s terrible
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years and loved it till now! They changed the formula and now retinol is the LAST ingredient...same price though. I thought Neutrogena was a reputable company. No thanks...do yourself a favor and try The Ordinary products. Even cheaper with more retinol and better ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Great wrinkly cream
customer_reviews.text: I do like all the Neutrogena products that I have tried. They have always delivered as advertised. This product is no exception. I use it on my forehead and between my eyes. With consistant use, for me, it has reduced the appearance of lines in that area. It is light weight and rubs into the skin very cleanly with no grease feel to it left on the skin. It does not leave my skin dry at all. It leaves it very smooth and soft feeling. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Opusbinky

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing, I noticed a marked difference after just 1 night. My skin was visibly smoother and brighter. I even didn't wear foundation today because I felt my skin looked so good. It's very light and doesn't take much time so soak in so you can go to bed straight away without it rubbing off on the pillow
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Cuneo

customer_reviews.title: definitely buy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using for a couple months. Skeptical at first - I'm a man and not into beauty things, but definitely worth.
